settings.title: 7 Reasons Why Women Are Ditching Expensive Skincare for This 100-Year-Old Beauty Secret
settings.subtitle: You might be surprised to learn that an ancient, all-natural ingredient could be the best moisturizer you’ll ever need.

settings.title: 1. The One-Ingredient Skincare Revolution That Makes $200 Creams Look Like Snake Oil
settings.content:
While most moisturizers are packed with 20+ ingredients (half of which you can’t pronounce), including fillers and preservatives that can cause irritation, Super Tallow is different.

Super Tallow contains exactly ONE ingredient: A 100% pure, grass-fed beef tallow moisturizer.

No fillers, No preservatives, No fragrance (which can legally hide up to 4,000 chemicals) that has been used for centuries to heal, hydrate, and transform skin.

settings.title: 2. REVEALED: The Centuries-Old Beauty Secret Modern Brands Don’t Want You to Know
settings.content:
Before the rise of synthetic skincare, tallow was the go-to moisturizer for generations. It’s been used for centuries to heal, protect, and nourish skin.  

Here’s the truth: Big skincare brands don’t want you to know about tallow because it’s a simple, effective alternative that challenges their profit-driven industry.

But why settle for overpriced, chemical-laden products when you can use something that’s stood the test of time?

settings.title: 3. Nature's Perfect Match: Why Your Skin Recognizes This Ingredient As Its Own
settings.content:
Here's a truth the beauty industry doesn't want you to discover, and even this is backed by science: beef tallow has an almost identical lipid profile to human skin. 

This means it absorbs effortlessly, nourishing your skin deeply without clogging pores, unlike water-based moisturizers that evaporate quickly.

Why does this matter? Because most moisturizers only hydrate the surface, leaving your skin dry and flaky within hours.

Super Tallow works at a cellular level, repairing your skin barrier and locking in moisture for 24/7 hydration.

settings.title: 4. The Essential Vitamins Your Expensive Moisturizer Leaves Out (And Why Your Skin Is Begging For Them)
settings.content:
Your skin craves vitamins, but synthetic versions in most skincare products are poorly absorbed.

Super Tallow is packed with vitamins A, D, E, and K - all in their most bioavailable form. These nutrients work synergistically to:

  • Stimulates collagen production (goodbye, fine lines)
  • Accelerate cell turnover (hello, glowing skin)
  • Fights free radical damage (take that, premature aging)
  • Support your skin barrier (see ya, sensitivity)

settings.title: 5. See Smoother, Hydrated, Glowing Skin in Just Days - Not Weeks or Months.
settings.content:
Let’s be honest: most skincare products promise the world but take forever to show results. Super Tallow is different.  

Within just days of using it, you’ll notice:  

✅ Softer, more hydrated skin  

✅ Reduces redness and irritation  

✅ Faster healing of dry patches and sensitive areas  

Its nutrient-dense formula penetrates deeply, providing immediate relief and lasting benefits.

Whether you’re dealing with dryness, redness, or sensitivity, Super Tallow works quickly to give you the glowing, healthy skin you deserve.

settings.question: What is tallow?
settings.answer: Tallow is a single-ingredient moisturizer that has been used for thousands of years. It is sourced from the fatty tissue of cows, and is rich in vitamins A, D, E, and K. Tallow has a lipid profile similar to that of human skin, so it is easily absorbed and nourishing to the skin barrier.

settings.question: What makes Super Tallow™ "super"?
settings.answer: Super Tallow™ is incredibly high quality tallow. It has a luxe texture & consistency, is 100% unscented, and is sourced from the best sustainable farms. We believe that grass-fed, grass-finished, happy cows make the best tallow. If you have tried other tallow products, you will see a night and day difference versus Super Tallow™.

settings.question: Does it have a smell?
settings.answer: No. Our tallow is completely unscented. You may pick up a 'beefy' scent using other tallow products, but not Super Tallow™.

settings.question: Does it cause breakouts?
settings.answer: No! Tallow is non-comedogenic, meaning is does not clog pores.

settings.question: When should I use it?
settings.answer: Any time your skin feels like it needs nourishment or is dry. Fit it into your daily routine however works best for you - some people love Super Tallow™ in their morning routine, some in their evening routine, and some in both!

settings.question: How should I store it?
settings.answer: Tallow is naturally shelf-stable at room temperature, and does not need to be refrigerated. The texture & consistency will change in cold & heat, so try to store it at ~70 degrees.

settings.question: Where can I get support?
settings.answer: Email hello@momonaskin.com and we will be happy to support however we can!

settings.question: Is it baby/pregnancy-safe?
settings.answer: Yes! Super Tallow™ is safe to use during pregnancy, breastfeeding, and on your baby.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: We do! Please bear with us as we try to get international shipping rates down.

settings.question: How much should I use?
settings.answer: A little goes a long way. We recommend a pea-to-penny sized amount. If you feel greasy, you are using too much.
